titleStmt.title: Marriage duties briefely couched togither out of Colossians, 3. 18, 19. By Thomas Gataker Bachelar of Diuinitie and pastor of Rotherhith.
titleStmt.author: Gataker, Thomas, 1574-1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Iones, for William Bladen, and are be sold at his shop at the signe of the Bible in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Also issued as part 6 of: Certaine sermons first preached and since published: London, 1622.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop at the signe of the Bible in Pauls Church-yard
